goal.ch: 本課程為企業與組織管理的入門課程，管理學院各科系皆有提供本課程。雖然本課程會依各科系的專業差異而略有不同的專注，但架構及學習目標上是一致的，請見本表下方的『課程學習目標』部分。本課程的課程內容主要以基本的企業內功能與全球商業環境的介紹為主，因此課程涵蓋範圍包括創業特質、企業組織、商業道德、全球經濟體系、企業領導與團隊合作、以及企業內的基本功能，例如資訊科技、人力資源、行銷管理、生產管理等等。
goal.en: "Introduction to Business is a fundamental course in business and organizational management education. This course is offered by many departments in the management school. Although its contents may be various due to different professional focuses of the departments, the main teaching subjects and learning objectives (see below) of this course are maintained to be consistent among its instances. The major teaching subjects include global economic systems, organization structures, basic management functions (human resources, information technologies, marketing, etc), leadership & teamwork and business ethics."

outline.ch:
"Part 1: INTRODUCTION
-Course introduction
Part 2: THE CONTEMPORARY BUSINESS WORLD
-Overview of contemporary business environment
-Business ethics & social responsibility
-Entrepreneurship & business ownership
-The global context of business
Part 3: THE BUSINESS OF MANAGING
-Business management
-Organizing the business
-Operations management & quality
Part 4: PEOPLE IN ORGANIZATIONS
-Employee behavior & motivation
-Term project proposal presentation: Selling your idea
-Leadership and decision making
-Human resource management & labor relations
Part 5: PRINCIPLES OF MARKETING
-Marketing processes and consumer behavior
-Pricing, distributing and promoting products
Part 6: MANAGING INFORMATION
-Information technology for business
-The role of accounting information
-Term project final presentation: Showing your accomplishment
EXAMINATION"
